title: 1999년 Stuart 사건
summary: 미국 Oregon, OR 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Stuart. 판결일: 1999-11-10. 법원: Court of Appeals of Oregon.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE OF OREGON v. DANNY BLAKE STUART
**판결일**: 1999-11-10
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Oregon
**관할**: Oregon, OR

**판사**: Armstrong, Edmonds, Warren

## 변호인

Eric M. Cumfer argued the cause and filed the briefs for appellant., Jonathan H. Fussner, Assistant Attorney General, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Hardy Myers, Attorney General, and Michael D. Reynolds, Solicitor General.

## 인용

- 164 Or. App. 169
- 989 P.2d 480

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM
Defendant appeals from a judgment convicting him of assault in the second degree. ORS 163.175(1)(c). All of defendant’s assignment of errors, except one, were decided in a companion case. See State v. Cook, 163 Or App 578, 989 P2d 474 (1999). Defendant’s remaining assignment of error does not merit discussion.
Judgment of conviction vacated; remanded for entry of judgment of conviction for lesser-included offense of third-degree assault.
...
